Trade/Device Name(s): VivaChek Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitoring System
VivaChek Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Meter (VGM200)
VivaChek Ino Blood Glucose Test Strips (VGS01)
Regulatory Class: Class I, meets the limitation of exemption 21 CFR 862.9(c)(5); Class II for glucose
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VivaChek Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Meter (VGM200)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VivaChek Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitoring System using amperometric technology to quantitatively measure glucose and β-hydroxybutyrate in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing by individuals with diabetes at home to quantitatively measure glucose and β-ketone concentrations in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip, as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for neonatal use or diagnosis/screening of diabetes, for single-person use only.
